alert.note: Alert for Barnstable; Eastern Essex; Eastern Norfolk; Eastern Plymouth; Nantucket; Suffolk (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Warning issued December 23 at 10:42AM EST until December 23 at 2:00PM EST by NWS Boston
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...One to three feet of inundation above ground level in low- lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways (4.0 to 13.6 feet Mean Lower Low Water). * WHERE...Eastern Essex MA, Suffolk MA, Eastern Norfolk MA, Eastern Plymouth MA, Barnstable MA and Nantucket MA Counties. * WHEN...Until 2 PM EST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Minor to moderate flooding of low-lying coastal locations is expected from Revere and Winthrop southward through Hull. The combination of high tides and large swells will result in washover onto coastal roadways and some road closures may occur around the time of high tide. Coastal flooding is expected along the North Shore from Marblehead northward along the coast to Newburyport. The combination of high tides and large swells will result in flooding of some immediate coastal roads and some road closures are anticipated. Minor coastal flooding begins on Easy Street in Nantucket. Expect minor coastal flooding of some low- lying roadways. Minor coastal flooding occurs in Provincetown, in the vicinity of Race Point Road and Provincetown Airport. In Truro backwater flooding occurs along the Pamet River. && Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. info.instruction: Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property. If travel is required, do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth.
